relevant_findings.endotracheal_intubation: Performed smoothly; no edema of epiglottis or vocal cords detected
relevant_findings.postoperative_check: No edema in the epiglottis, vocal cords, trachea, or carina

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient did not experience an edema attack for the past year prior to surgery; edema alternated between feet every 10 days post-discharge but resolved by week 8.
